Package server.user

Class UserStore

java.lang.Object
server.user.UserStore
public final class UserStore
extends java.lang.Object
Stores users and their related attributes

    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.util.regex.Pattern INVALID_USERID_PATTERN

  • Field Details

    • INVALID_USERID_PATTERN

      public static final java.util.regex.Pattern INVALID_USERID_PATTERN
      A pattern which matches to any invalid userId

  • Method Details

    • getPublicUser

      public static NetPublicUser getPublicUser​(java.lang.String userId) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.io.IOException
      Retrieves a NetPublicUser containing the data for the specified userId
      Parameters:
      userId - the userId of the user to retrieve
      Returns:
      a NetPublicUser containing the data for the specified userId
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified userId does not exist
      java.io.IOException - if there was an error reading the user's data

    • getUser

      public static User getUser​(java.lang.String userId, java.security.Key decryptionKey) throws java.lang.SecurityException
      Retrieves the user with the specified userId or null if none could be found or there was an error in retrieving them
      Parameters:
      userId - the userId of the user to retrieve
      decryptionKey - the key to use to read the user file if necessary
      Returns:
      the user with the specified userId
      Throws:
      java.lang.SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to access the requested user
      See Also:
      getUserInternal(java.lang.String, java.security.Key)

    • login

      public static User login​(java.lang.String userId, byte[] password)
      Retrieves the user with the specified userId and checks the given password against it
      Parameters:
      userId - the userId of the user to retrieve
      password - the password of the requested user
      Returns:
      the user with the specified userId or null if the password is incorrect

    • getUserKey

      public static java.security.Key getUserKey​(java.lang.String userId) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Retrieves a user's secret key or null if the current user does not have the permissions to access it
      Parameters:
      userId - the userId to retrieve the key for
      Returns:
      the user's secret key
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified user does not exist

    • subscribeToDeletionEvents

      public static void subscribeToDeletionEvents​(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.Runnable onUserDeletion) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Registers the given method to be run if the specified user is deleted
      Parameters:
      userId - the userId of the user to check
      onUserDeletion - the method to be run
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified user does not exist

    • unsubscribeFromDeletionEvents

      public static void unsubscribeFromDeletionEvents​(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.Runnable callback)
      Unregisters the given method from being run when the specified user is deleted
      Parameters:
      userId - the userId of the user being checked
      callback - the method which would be run

    • createUser

      public static void createUser​(User user) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.io.IOException, java.lang.SecurityException
      Registers the given user and creates all required files
      Parameters:
      user - the user to create
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the userId of the given user is invalid
      java.io.IOException - if there is an error creating any of the required files
      java.lang.SecurityException - if the current user does not have the permissions to create the specified user

    • deleteUser

      public static void deleteUser​(java.lang.String userId) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.io.IOException, java.lang.SecurityException
      Deletes the specified user
      Parameters:
      userId - the userId of the user to delete
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified user does not exist
      java.io.IOException - if there is an error deleting the user's files
      java.lang.SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to delete the specified user
